Mandate: Maintain law and order, protect lives and property, and support anti-crime intelligence efforts.
TopPriorities: Disrupt smuggling networks and fraudulent supply chains in Chingola area.
Enhance community policing to gather witness information on VAT fraud cases.
Digitize crime reporting and integrate with ZRA intelligence portal.
ActiveOperations: Joint task force managing asset seizures and evidence handover to Economic and Financial Crimes Court.
Rapid response units embedded with ZRA audit teams in high-risk zones.
Public awareness campaigns on financial fraud broadcast on local media.

RecentActions.Title: Crime prevention operation in Chingola
RecentActions.Summary: Conducted patrols and community engagement to prevent criminal activities.

RecentActions.Title: Support for revenue fraud investigation
RecentActions.Summary: Provided security escort and investigative support for tax fraud cases.

RecentActions.Title: Support for revenue fraud investigation
RecentActions.Summary: Provided security escort and investigative support for tax fraud cases.

KeyPartnerships: Economic and Financial Crimes Court security detail

Mandate: Maintain law and order, protect lives and property, and support anti-crime intelligence efforts.
TopPriorities: Disrupt smuggling networks and fraudulent supply chains in Livingstone area.
Enhance community policing to gather witness information on VAT fraud cases.
Digitize crime reporting and integrate with ZRA intelligence portal.
ActiveOperations: Joint task force managing asset seizures and evidence handover to Economic and Financial Crimes Court.
Rapid response units embedded with ZRA audit teams in high-risk zones.
Public awareness campaigns on financial fraud broadcast on local media.
